TEI.2.document_title: Thomas J Chambers to Stephen F Austin, 05-12-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas J. Chambers to Austin, May 12, 1830. Great alarm in East Texas over rumors that State and Federal Governments plan injury to American settlers. Imprisonment of Padilla, the land commissioner, strengthens suspicions.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 373

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas J. Chambers to Austin, May 12, 1830. Great alarm in East Texas over rumors that State and Federal Governments plan injury to American settlers. Imprisonment of Padilla, the land commissioner, strengthens suspicions. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*Dear Sir, I have been sometime hunting for you, and not having been able to fall in with you, I have determined to await you a few days in this *location_mentioned*place*/location_mentioned*. Business of importance to the *person_mentioned*public*/person_mentioned* brings me to see you. The *person_mentioned*Commissioner */person_mentioned*is imprisoned and suspended by the *person_mentioned*Political Chief*/person_mentioned* on a charge of murder. The most violent and fatal meaures are takeing both by the *location_mentioned*States */location_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*general governments*/person_mentioned* in relation to the *location_mentioned*colonies */location_mentioned*of this department, so far as relates to the *person_mentioned*Americans*/person_mentioned*. Some of these measures are open and public, but others consist in Secret orders directed to various *person_mentioned*persons in the department*/person_mentioned*. The information I possess on this subject, I will communicate to you when I see you.*/p*
*p*The ebullition of public feeling in our *location_mentioned*quarter */location_mentioned*is fearfull. I think the public wellfare requires your immediate atention. I hope to see you in a few days.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*T. J. Chambers */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Sn. Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-12-1830"> May 12th 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* Donde se halle *person_mentioned*Majr. Lewis*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
